content.question: Which of the following arguments most directly contradicts Grimsley’s argument in the excerpt?

choices.label: The army succeeded in its main mission to encourage White loyalty to the Union.
The racial system in the South remained largely unchanged after Reconstruction.
Some supporters of women’s rights opposed the expansion of African American rights.
Many African Americans in the South felt politically empowered after the end of slavery.

content.answer: Many African Americans in the South felt politically empowered after the end of slavery.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
